description: This file defines a React custom hook `useStreamedGenerator` that manages streaming code generation, including state management for streaming status, code buffer, metadata, error handling, and UI toggles. It interacts with an API to start, cancel, and retry streaming generation, also handling both streaming and fallback non-streaming modes.

methods.name: useStreamedGenerator()
methods.description: React hook to manage streaming code generation, buffer states, UI status, start/cancel/retry functionality.
